archiefmat.titel: Documenten met betrekking tot de vrije zwarte vrouw Dominga Sabana, alias Dominga Gracia, levensgezellin van J.H. de Lannoy
archiefmat.titel_eng: Documents regarding the free black woman Dominga Sabana, alias Dominga Gracia, partner of J.H. de Lannoy
archiefmat.scope: deed regarding the purchase of the plantation 'Stadtzigt' by Dominga Sabana (1779); document regarding the purchase of land by Dominga Sabana (1788); document regarding the purchase of two plantations, 'St. Jacob' and 'Muizenberg', by Dominga Sabana; document regarding the purchase of a slave by Dominga Sabana.
